name: Compost Bin
effect: Provides a small eco boost over time

name: Wind Turbine
effect: Doubles the eco-points gained per tree planted

name: Recycling Center
effect: Reduces the cost of future upgrades by 10%

name: Carbon Capture Technology
effect: Generates eco points automatically every minute

name: Biodiversity Preserve
effect: Increases eco points per tree planted by 50%

name: Community Education Program
effect: Increases eco points earned per click by 10%

name: Greenhouse
effect: Allows the planting of rare trees for extra eco points
